name: SYMMETRIC
description: This game is an interesting puzzle, and its object is to draw a line through checkpoints. The main difficulty is to plan the route; to make it right, you need to think carefully sometimes. The further you progress, the harder the levels become, and the challenges are getting more interesting.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
